promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a chibi young special wolf electric-type with white fur. It can be found in thunderstorm-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or electric. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Thunderwolf, a chibi young special wolf electric-type pokemon. It can be found in thunderstorm-like environments It has the following abilities: ion-deluge. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word wolf or electric or the ability names. promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, wolf-like, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, lightning background
generatedDescription: Thunderwolf lives in storms, brightening the sky with its spark-filled play. Its Ion-Deluge fills the air with power!
